question: Which country has signed a peace agreement with Russia and Azerbaijan to end the war over Nagorno-Karabakh?
explanation:
The Prime Minister of Armenian has announced that a peace agreement has been signed with Russia and Azerbaijan. The agreement aims to end the war between Armenia and Azerbaijan over the disputed area of Nagorno-Karabakh.
Under the agreement, all military operations in the disputed area have been stopped and Russia has deployed peacekeeping forces in the Armenia â€“ Azerbaijan border.
